task.title: Disintegrate test suites from qTest
task.shortdesc: Katalon allows you to disintegrate a test suite or all test suites in a folder from qTest.

steps.stepsection: Disintegrate a test suite from qTest

step.cmd: To remove the integration between the Katalon test suite and the registered qTest location, navigate to the Integration tab of the test suite. Select a qTest location, click Disintegrate.
step.info: Alternatively, you can also right-click on the test suite you wish to disintegrate. Select qTest > Disintegrate.

step.cmd: Click OK on the Confirmation dialog. The integration between the test suite and the registered qTest location is removed.

steps.stepsection: Disintegrate a test suite folder from qTest

step.cmd: To break the connection of all test suites in a test suite folder from qTest, in the Tests Explorer view, right-click on the test suite folder you wish to disintegrate. Select qTest > Disintegrate.
Click OK on the Confirmation dialog. The integration between the test suite folder and qTest is removed.
